00025 //

00028 #define WAVETRACK_MERGE_POINT_TOLERANCE 0.01

00032 typedef struct REGION
00033 {
00034    double start, end;
00035    
00036    //used for sorting
00037    static int cmp( REGION **a, REGION **b )
00038    { 
00039       return ( ( *a )->start < ( *b )->start ) ? -1 : 1; 
00040    }
00041 }Region;
00042 WX_DEFINE_ARRAY( Region*, Regions );

00279 
00280    // Move a clip into a new track. This will remove the clip
00281    // in this cliplist and add it to the cliplist of the
00282    // other clip. No fancy additional stuff is done.
00283    void MoveClipToTrack(int clipIndex, WaveTrack* dest);
00284    void MoveClipToTrack(WaveClip *clip, WaveTrack* dest);

00286    // Merge two clips, that is append data from clip2 to clip1,
00287    // then remove clip2 from track.
00288    // clipidx1 and clipidx2 are indices into the clip list.
00289    bool MergeClips(int clipidx1, int clipidx2);
